pli-tv-bu-vb-sk56:1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā bhaggesu viharati susumāragire bhesakaḷāvane migadāye.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk56:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū kokanade pāsāde sasitthakaṃ pattadhovanaṃ antaraghare chaḍḍenti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk56:1.4: “kathañhi nāma samaṇā sakyaputtiyā sasitthakaṃ pattadhovanaṃ antaraghare chaḍḍessanti, seyyathāpi gihī kāmabhogino”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk56:1.5: Assosuṃ kho bhikkhū tesaṃ manussānaṃ ujjhāyantānaṃ khiyyantānaṃ vipācentānaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk56:1.6: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk56:1.7: “kathañhi nāma bhikkhū sasitthakaṃ pattadhovanaṃ antaraghare chaḍḍessantī”ti …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk56:1.8: “saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, bhikkhū sasitthakaṃ pattadhovanaṃ antaraghare chaḍḍentī”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk56:1.11: kathañhi nāma te, bhikkhave, moghapurisā sasitthakaṃ pattadhovanaṃ antaraghare chaḍḍessanti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk56:1.13: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk56:1.14: “Na sasitthakaṃ pattadhovanaṃ antaraghare chaḍḍessāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk56:1.16: Yo anādariyaṃ paṭicca sasitthakaṃ pattadhovanaṃ antaraghare chaḍḍeti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk56:1.22: uddharitvā vā bhinditvā vā paṭiggahe vā nīharitvā vā chaḍḍeti,
